title._content: Fuller, John H. of Keene NH

description._content: TITLE Fuller, John H. of Keene NH CREATOR SUBJECT Men - NH - Keene Business people, American - NH - Keene DESCRIPTION Photograph of John H. Fuller of Keene New Hampshire. He was probably born in Lunenburg MA about 1792 and spent his boyhood in Walpole NH. He went into business with a store first in Chesterfield and then in Winchester and married Pamela Conant of Winchester and they had 6 children. He came to Keene in 1823 and took a store, accumulating a large property. He developed the tract of land between Cross, Court and Washington streets. He greatly assisted in the building of the Ashuelot railroad and the Keene savings bank. He died in 1869. PUBLISHER Keene Public Library DATE DIGITAL 20080229 DATE ORIGINAL RESOURCE TYPE photographs FORMAT image/jpg RESOURCE IDENTIFIER hsykppl016 RIGHTS MANAGMENT No known restriction on publication.
